answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found the Fire Department grooming standards from Portland, OR  and a number of other cities which may be helpful too.
Portland, OR, General order 51:
http://www.ci.portland.or.us/fire/TPM2011Fire.pdf
Clark County, WA:
http://www.clarkfr.org/docs/Policies/Policy%20524.11.08%20Grooming%20Standards.pdf
Washington Township, MI:
http://miwashington.com/files/FF%20Guidelines.pdf
Columbia, SC:
http://www.columbiasc.net/downloads/Fire/Adm_SOG/ADM-028_Uniform__Personal_Appearance_050508.pdf
 Indianola, IA:
https://sites.google.com/site/wcfireacademy/Home/rules--regulations
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org
